description:
And I like it.
Mining and economie is alike The Settlers 2 but has some twists to it.
You can upgrade specific buildings (Mines, Taverns).
I have played Settlers 2 lots of time and used to play it in Dosbox too, but now I can play Widelands native on my laptop. 
Love it.

It has nice music. Everything else is so bad. The design, the graphics, the interface. Look, you click on somewhere, and then the mouse teleports on another place because a window appears far off. That, is juust one, detail. There are many more. And it is, very annoying. I do not know why I went past the main menu, clearly this game is beyond hope.
Super Aufbauspiel mit Wirtschafts- und Kampfsystem. Für alle die Games wie die Siedler oder Anno mögen.
summary: Sehr toller Klon von den Siedlern
